questions: What do you think of the fox?
article:
The lion says that he is _ . So he asks all the animals to come and listen to his last wishes.
The cat comes to the lion's cave . He stands there and goes in. Then a sheep goes in. Before she comes out, a rabbit goes in to hear the last wishes of the king of animals.
But soon the lion looks well again, and goes out of his cave. He sees a fox  waiting outside. "Why don't you come in?" asks the lion to the fox.
"I beg your pardon," says the fox, "I see many animals go into your cave, but nobody comes out. Before they come out again, I will wait outside."
